#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int reverse(int n)
{
     int temp=0,rev=0;
     
     while(n>0)
     {
                temp=n%10;
                rev=rev*10+temp;
                n=n/10;
                }
                return rev;
                }
     
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,temp,p;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
             cin>>n;
              for(i=n+1;;i= i+1)
              {
                           temp=i;
                          p= reverse(i);
                          if(p==temp)
                          break;
              }
                        cout<<i<<endl;
              }
                          return 0;
              }
